name: MKPointOfInterestFilter
desc: A filter that includes or excludes point of interest categories from a map view, local search, or local search completer.

items.name: class var excludingAll: MKPointOfInterestFilter
items.desc: A filter that excludes all point of interest categories.

items.name: class var includingAll: MKPointOfInterestFilter
items.desc: A filter that includes all point of interest categories.

items.name: init(excluding: [MKPointOfInterestCategory])
items.desc: Initialize the point of interest filter with a list of categories to exclude.

items.name: init(including: [MKPointOfInterestCategory])
items.desc: Initialize the point of interest filter with a list of categories to include.

items.name: func excludes(MKPointOfInterestCategory) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the filter excludes the point of interest category.

items.name: func includes(MKPointOfInterestCategory) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the filter includes the point of interest category.
